input_email_body:
Subject: Problem of Unexpected Access Denied

Description of the incident: Unexpected denial of access to medical records. There may be an issue related to server configuration or a recent security update. Efforts already made: Servers were restarted, logs were reviewed, and user permissions were confirmed You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. Immediate assistance is needed to resolve this My name is Liu Wei.. Please provide a resolution or direct me on the next steps for troubleshooting.
